ygData.subject: Re: UNSUB-FUCKING-SCRIBE
ygData.msgSnippet: friendly fyi: watch the stuff in south ro by the oasis zone border. it s not only cheesy , but it s an exploit and you could get banned for it. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
friendly fyi: watch the stuff in south ro by the oasis zone border. it's not
only "cheesy", but it's an exploit and you could get banned for it.

-----Original Message-----
From: Gooey Smalls <smullins@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 31, 1999 7:16 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] UNSUB-FUCKING-SCRIBE


>From: "Gooey Smalls" <smullins@...>
>
>Everything up to lvl 12 is super easy, for lvl 12 to 13 i stayed in misty
>thicket killing sand scarabs, strong giant spiders, strong giant wasp and
>young kodiaks, lvl 13 to 14 i did in south ro, this zone is awesome, there
>is a dune towards the oasis zone point where you can stand and the monster
>just run away, so you step out, bait them back, step back cast and repeat
to
>take on yellow mummies and dune terantulas, cheesy but effective. I did
>this with my druid only doing 36 a hit, a wizard doing 78 would be much
more
>effective. After lvl 14 go to oasis and group, simple as that, at lvl 18
>your options expand to high hold for orc or gnoll groups, permafrost if
>you're feeling brave, and parts of unrest. GET ME OFF OF THIS FUCKING LIST
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>What do lizards and rock music have in common?
>http://www.onelist.com
>They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
>
